sense.gloss: one's past (that one would prefer remained secret)
to pass through, to pass by, to go beyond
to have expired, to have ended, to be over
to exceed, to surpass, to be above
to be excessive, to be too much, to be too ...
passing through (a tunnel, station, town, etc.), passing by (e.g. of a typhoon), transit
passage (of a bill, e.g. through parliament), carriage
passing (an examination, inspection, etc.), clearing, getting through (a preliminary round), qualification
to overdo (esp. of one's alcohol consumption), to drink (alcohol)
to take care of, to support
to overdo, to do too much

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓き↑過↑↓す↓ぎたものであっても、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えをなくしたくない。
sdata.e: I don't want to lose my ideas, even though some of them are a bit extreme.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑考↑↓かんが↓えることが↑多↑↓おお↓↑過↑↓す↓ぎる。
sdata.e: I have too many things on my mind these days.

sdata.j: それは↑高↑↓たか↓↑過↑↓す↓ぎる。
ほとんどの↑科学↑↓かがく↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑進歩↑↓しんぽ↓は↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓のことについての↑発見↑↓はっけん↓に↑過↑↓す↓ぎない。
sdata.e: Most scientific breakthroughs are nothing else than the discovery of the obvious.

sdata.j: ↑過去↑↓かこ↓は↑知↑↓し↓られているが↑変↑↓か↓えられない。↑未来↑↓みらい↓は↑未知↑↓みち↓だが↑変↑↓か↓えることができる。
sdata.e: The past can only be known, not changed. The future can only be changed, not known.

sdata.j: ↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓で１２↑時間↑↓じかん↓↑過↑↓す↓ごした。
sdata.e: I spent twelve hours on the train.

sdata.j: ↑午後↑↓ごご↓はずっと↑友人↑↓ゆうじん↓とおしゃべりをして↑過↑↓す↓ごした。
sdata.e: I spent the whole afternoon chatting with friends.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑夕方↑↓ゆうがた↓↑本↑↓ほん↓を↑読↑↓よ↓んで↑過↑↓す↓ごしました。
sdata.e: He spent the evening reading a book.

sdata.j: ↑食↑↓た↓べ↑過↑↓す↓ぎると↑太↑↓ふと↓る。
sdata.e: If you eat too much, you'll become fat.

sdata.j: ↑都会↑↓とかい↓では↑気付↑↓きづ↓かれず↑通↑↓とお↓り↑過↑↓す↓ぎることもあるだろうが、↑村↑↓むら↓の↑中↑↓なか↓ではそうはいかない。
sdata.e: In a town you may pass unnoticed, whereas in a village it's impossible.
